title: The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Alexandria Introduces New Facial treatment collectionTravelandtourworld.com
text:
The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Alexandria Introduces New Facial treatment collection
The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Alexandria introduces a new menu of facial treatments that will meet everyone’s needs and wishes.The new facials are by Anne Semonin, a French brand with 25 years experience in the field. At Anne Semonin, it is believed that a person’s beauty needs are unique. Their philosophy is to customise product combinations and treatments using blends of trace elements and essential oils to perfectly complement each individual beauty requirement.
The new facial collection offers a range of treatments for ageing skin, anti-wrinkling, oily skin and simply cleansing and hydrating the skin for a fresh and healthy glow.
The signature treatment is the specially designed Glowing Mother-to-Be Facial, the only treatment of this kind offered in Alexandria. This treatment includes facial and massage. It nurtures the body with a special therapy to treat muscle aches, reduce fluid and imbue total rejuvenation of the face and body. The pregnancy-specific massage and tailored facial combine into one seamless pleasure melting away fatigue and revealing a radiant mother-to-be.
Source:- Four Seasons
